is_issued

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

issuebook_set

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>
title

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

book

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

library_manager.views module

library_manager.views.add_book(request)[source]

Allows the user to add a new book to the library

library_manager.views.add_student(request)[source]

Allows the user to add a new student to the library database

library_manager.views.admin_signup(request)[source]

Used to register a new user

library_manager.views.book_delete(request, pk)[source]

Allows the user to delete a book from the library database

library_manager.views.book_update(request, pk)[source]

Allows the user to update the information of a book in the library database

library_manager.views.dashboard_view(request)[source]
library_manager.views.home_view(request)[source]

Shows the homepage

library_manager.views.issue_book(request)[source]

Allows the user to issue a book to a student

library_manager.views.issued_books(request)[source]

Lists all the issued books in the library

library_manager.views.return_book(request, book_issue_id)[source]

Allows the user to return a book that has been issued to a student

library_manager.views.student_delete(request, pk)[source]

Allows the user to delete a student from the library database

library_manager.views.student_update(request, pk)[source]

Allows the user to update the details of a student

library_manager.views.view_books(request)[source]

Lists all the books in the library

library_manager.views.view_students(request)[source]

Lists all the students
